QuestData.Title: A Desperate Bargain
QuestData.Description:
It looks like your friend didn't make it. A pity, but we must move on.
You'll want to plead our case to Helya. She is the ruler here. I would accompany you, but I'm afraid I wouldn't help your case.
Meet me when you are finished. I will see if I can find the whereabouts of my shieldmaidens.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Helya and ask to be freed from Helheim.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The air hangs silent as you approach.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Helya's voice fills the air as you stand>$B$BNobody leaves Helheim without my approval! Entertain me, and I may let you pass.
